notes.title: Conflict of interest
notes.p: RP is full-time employee at the University of Catania, Italy. In relation to the topic of communicable disease, RP has received research funding from Alfa-Wassermann, manufacturer of broad-spectrum antibiotics. RP is also the founder of the Center of Excellence for the acceleration of Harm Reduction at the University of Catania (CoEHAR), which has received a grant from Foundation for a Smoke-Free World to develop and carry out 8 research projects and scientific advisor for LIAF, Lega Italiana Anti Fumo (Italian acronym for Italian Anti-Smoking League). MS and DP declare no conflicts of interest.
